about.title: About KhetiAI
about.description: KhetiAI is an intelligent agricultural assistant designed to revolutionize farming through AI-powered insights, natural communication, and smart crop analysis.
about.missionText: We believe that every farmer deserves access to cutting-edge agricultural technology. KhetiAI bridges the gap between traditional farming wisdom and modern AI capabilities, making sustainable and profitable agriculture accessible to farmers worldwide.
about.innovationDescription: Leveraging the latest AI technology to solve real farming challenges
about.accessibilityDescription: Making advanced farming tools available to farmers of all backgrounds
about.resultsDescription: Delivering measurable improvements in crop yield and farming efficiency
about.keyFeaturesDescription: Discover how KhetiAI transforms your farming experience
about.voiceInterfaceDescription: Natural communication in local languages makes farming advice accessible to everyone, regardless of literacy level.
about.smartAnalysisDescription: Camera-based analysis provides instant insights on crop health, growth progress, and potential issues.
about.aiPredictionsDescription: Advanced algorithms predict optimal sowing and harvesting periods with accurate ripening time estimates.
about.yieldOptimizationDescription: Real-time recommendations help improve crop yield through data-driven farming decisions.
about.localizedGuidanceDescription: Personalized advice that adapts to your specific crop conditions and local farming practices.
about.sustainableFarmingDescription: Promotes eco-friendly practices that protect the environment while maximizing productivity.
about.step1Description: Use your voice or text to ask about your crops, weather, or farming challenges.
about.step2Description: Take photos of your crops for instant health analysis and growth monitoring.
about.step3Description: Receive personalized recommendations and predictions tailored to your farm.
about.step4Description: Implement the suggestions and watch your farming efficiency and yield improve.
about.ctaDescription: Join thousands of farmers who are already using KhetiAI to make smarter, more sustainable farming decisions.
